text: Afrostyrax is a genus of plant in family Huaceae. It contains the following species: * Afrostyrax kamerunensis G.Perkins & Gilg * Afrostyrax lepidophyllus Mildbr. * Afrostyrax macranthus Mildbr. ==References== Category:Huaceae Category:Oxalidales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Afrostyrax
